title: EX–4 EX–4 "Straw Hat Theatre #4: No Respect Time"Transliteration: "Mugiwara Gekijō Sono Yon: Jingi Nai Time" (Japanese:麦わら劇場その4「仁義ないTime」) N/A N/A October 22, 2006(2006-10-22)[n 8] January 4, 2015
transformers_text:
EX–4 EX–4 "Straw Hat Theatre #4: No Respect Time"Transliteration: "Mugiwara Gekijō Sono Yon: Jingi Nai Time" (Japanese:麦わら劇場その4「仁義ないTime」) N/A N/A October 22, 2006(2006-10-22)[n 8] January 4, 2015

The three mafia leaders, Don Luffione(ドン·ルフィオーネ,Don Rufiōne), Don Zorocia(ドン·ゾロシア), and Don Sanjino(ドン·サンジーノ)meet. After an argument, Don Zoroscia declares war. The mafia heads dispatch the assassins Usotoūya(ウソトウーヤ), Choparīni(チョパリーニ), Namimore(ナミモーレ), and Robita(ロビータ)to kill their peers.[28]
